main-text:
Agent: James Bond
Mission 1: Arkangelsk
Part i: Dam
BACKGROUND:
MI6 has confirmed the existence of a secret
chemical warfare facility at the Byelomorye dam,
USSR. Its heavily guarded location and workings
are a cause for major concert. Nerve gas
produced there has been turning up in the hands
of hostile regimes around the world and deals
with international terrorists have been rumored.
This facility should be destroyed with extreme
prejudice.
